0.text: Bug 2312  [Perspective] Need to show something when all views closed (1GENTGJ).

1.text: If you close all the views in the perspective, it remains open, but looks very bare, and it's not clear what the user can do next.

2.text: Simply closing the perspective is one option, though it might be surprising.

3.text: Another would be to show a view which lets you navigate to other perspectives, or close this one.

4.text: This is particularly bad for the Help perspective, since it only contains one view.

5.text: Clicking the help view's close button is a natural thing to do when done with the help.

6.text: NOTES:  DS (6/6/01 11:39:44 AM) 	We can pop up a dialog asking the user what they want to do .. 		1.

10.text: It would also be good to have a disable button on the dialog, as in "do not show again".
